dcterms:description: The PROOF dataset includes 2170 adult patients diagnosed with axial spondyloarthritis (axSpA) within one year prior to study enrollment, with 1483 radiographs available for training in this study.
dcterms:title: PROOF

dcterms:description: The GESPIC dataset is a multicenter inception cohort study in Germany that includes 525 patients with axSpA, providing 436 radiographs for inference in this study.
dcterms:title: GESPIC

dcterms:description: The OptiRef dataset includes 361 patients who reported symptoms suggestive of axSpA, with 340 images available for inference in this study.
dcterms:title: OptiRef

dcterms:creator: Torsten Diekhoff
Kay-Geert A. Hermann

dcterms:description: The DAMACT dataset combines data from the SIMACT trial and the VNCa/SWI trial, including 178 patients with suspected axSpA, providing 163 radiographs for inference in this study.
dcterms:title: DAMACT

dcterms:creator: Dominik Deppe
Kay-Geert Hermann

dcterms:description: The VNCa/SWI dataset generates CT-like images of the sacroiliac joint from MRI using susceptibility-weighted imaging in patients with axial spondyloarthritis.
dcterms:title: VNCa/SWI
